channel.title: CVE Feed for AppsAnywhere -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AppsAnywhere -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-41137|2024-09-04T13:44:57.980Z -- appsanywhere -- appsanywhere%20client
item.description: Symmetric encryption used to protect messages between the AppsAnywhere server and client can be broken by reverse engineering the client and used to impersonate the AppsAnywhere server.

item.title: CVE-2023-41138|2024-09-04T13:38:11.911Z -- appsanywhere -- appsanywhere%20client
item.description: The AppsAnywhere macOS client-privileged helper can be tricked into executing arbitrary commands with elevated permissions by a local user process.
